data.text: @cliffskarstedt These people need to read the room….there is an actual war taking place in Europe. An unprovoked attack by a real dictator taking away REAL freedoms. In fact I saw a Ukrainian man crossing a destroyed bridge wearing a mask….these “freedom fighters” are ridiculous! Move on.
@reynolds_mary @cliffskarstedt Easier for the police to smile and wave at these morons than have to deal with a larger group of citizens who are sick and tired of this moronic behaviour.

@cliffskarstedt Police specifically asked counter-protester groups not to attend. Guarantee there’s a lot more of them than this vocal, lawless minority. This is not a reflection of who we are in Peterborough with well over 85% of the community vaccinated & adhering to public health measures.
